text:
Permission is hereby granted to Radio Station
__ of the __
located at ____ to broadcast
phonograph records manufactured by us, for the calendar
year, 1940, provided that*
1. The Station does not sell time, or use the
records for profit
2. The Station will use only records which are
in good condition for use on the air.
3. No record will be played more than once in
any one day, except when it is a part of a
continuous program and then for educational
purposes.
Violation of these provisions shall be cause for
revocation of the permission herein granted.
